location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX MAP to ROUTES IN PERSIA Vol. IV Part II.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 510 x 525mm, on sheet 625 x 605mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies Mobilisation Routes in Persia. (Vol. IV, Part II) (Fars, Laristan, Kerman and Yazd).The map shows a region of central and southern Persia, indicating routes described in the volume, cities, towns, roads, tracks, paths and hydrology. Numbers and letters identify the corresponding Survey of India sheets.The map includes a printing statement which reads 'Simla Drawing Office No 2914. September. 1922.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
